BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Pamela S. Brier, M.P.H. to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment as a member of the Board of Health, pursuant to Sections 31 and 553 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Communication from the Bronx Democratic County Executive Committee – Recommending the name of Nero Graham, Jr. to the Council regarding his appointment to the New York City Board of Elections, pursuant to the provisions of Section 3-204 of the New York State Election Law.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Pamela S. Brier, M.P.H. to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment as a member of the Board of Health, pursuant to Sections 31 and 553 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
